descriptor.name: Veggie Supreme
descriptor.short_desc: A supreme combination of black olives, green capsicum, mushroom, onion, spicy red paprika & juicy sweet corn with flavourful pan sauce and 100% mozzarella cheese. (PAN Per/Med-254 Kcal/100g | TnC-258 Kcal/100g | Stuffed Crust Add : Per: 227 Kcal/100g | Med: 216 Kcal/100g) Contains Cereals containing Gluten (Wheat), Soya and Milk & Milk Products.
